00012 vcl_ostream& operator<<(vcl_ostream& s, vgui_button b)
00013 {
00014   char const *spc = "";
00015   if (b & vgui_LEFT)   { s << spc << "left";   spc=" "; }
00016   if (b & vgui_MIDDLE) { s << spc << "middle"; spc=" "; }
00017   if (b & vgui_RIGHT)  { s << spc << "right";           }
00018   return s;
00019 }
